name: Silent Witness (VR)
description:
Note:
This game was made as part of Nordic Game Jam. We made a mistake and uploaded an incorrect build to Itch.io -- and as the platform prevents publishing new builds until a jam is complete -- we are now locked from submitting anything for the next week.

Meanwhile you can download Silent Witness (VR) through the links below:
Windows version (should work with most VR headsets):
https://drive.google.com/file/d/1j8xgN6lEKlwRV06CoTEEjVPDVVk5Srcg/view?usp=shari...
Android version (Oculus Quest):
https://drive.google.com/file/d/1IrlvaUnLZdXPx8KZr5ywhi1UNwqaLDy_/view?usp=shari...

* We're also publishing on Sidequest in a few days.
** We're considering making a non-VR version, although it would be a considerably poorer experience.
